text.div:
Properties

CodeURLTypeDescription
statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statuscodeStatus of the concept
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0273 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
AV Available for patient careAvailable for patient care
CA DeletedDeleted
OB ObsoleteObsolete
UN Unavailable for patient careUnavailable for patient care

Additional Language Displays

CodeDeutsch (German, de)
AVVerfügbar (Kann zur Behandlung herangezogen werden.)
CAGelöscht
OBNicht mehr relevant
UNNicht verfügbar (Kann nicht zur Behandlung verwendet werden.)

name: DocumentAvailabilityStatus
title: documentAvailabilityStatus
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts used to define whether a patient document is appropriate or available for use in patient care.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the TXA segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0273 (Document Availability Status)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

designation.value: Nicht verfügbar (Kann nicht zur Behandlung verwendet werden.)
